name: The Machine at the Center of the Earth
name_original: The Machine at the Center of the Earth
description:
My submission for LD46 with the theme "Keep it Alive".

Your goal: keep The Machine running as long as possible while it falls apart around you.

A hint for once you figure out where stuff is: the warning lights on the top bar are each linked to one thing, so you can tell what's broken by checking the lights.

Things on the post-LD todo list:

  • Some music. I'm terrible with music and wanted to submit for compo so no music this time.
  • Split screen multiplayer!
  • More than one level.
  • Escalating difficulty with a nice tension curve to create highs and lows.
  • Maybe a minimap or something to help with navigation, especially on first playthroughs.
